song_lyric:
alasin garzart erdem surhaar khuireed irkhed bi chin
ajai buural abu ig nurhad garla da
alhan door nuilmes an buiteen uulaad hotsarsan abu daan
alag tsetseg ekheleh sar daan ochaad jolgana da
ha ah ha ah......
ha ha ha.....
ochaad jolgana da


khunnai gazart erdem surhaar khuireed irkhed bi chin
khoigshin buural eej an nurhad garla da
khoimseg in door nuilmes an buiteen uulaad hotsarsan ejj deen
khoikhen duunai ekehn sar daan ochaad jolgana da
ha ah ha ah......
ah ah ah.....
ochaad jolgana da



hol in garzart erdem surhaar khuireed irkhed bi chin
horbod gantshaan nutug us an orkhad garla da
holbo nuur in tsengkher melmij cham tai hotsarsan nutug taan
hoit zuunai ekehn ai sar taan ochaad jolgana da
ha ah ha ah......
ah ah ah.....
ochaad jolgana da
